mapper.insert: insert into salary_sheet(id, employee_id, employee_name, create_time, job, base_wage, post_wage, total_salary, tax, insurance, housing_fund, taxed_salary, state, salary_account) values (#{id}, #{employeeId}, #{employeeName}, #{createTime}, #{job}, #{baseWage}, #{postWage}, #{totalSalary}, #{tax}, #{insurance}, #{housingFund}, #{taxedSalary}, #{state}, #{salaryAccount})
mapper.update: update salary_sheet set state=#{state} where id=#{sheetId}
update salary_sheet set state=#{state} where id=#{sheetId} and state=#{prev}
mapper.select: select * from salary_sheet order by id desc limit 0,1;
